full_summary:
# TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

## Requirement Title
Instructional Design and Development Services - Learning Services

## Project Details
**Solicitation Number:** W7809A123030
**Organization:** Department of National Defence (DND)
**Category:** Services
**North American Industry Classification System (NAICS):** 611430 (Educational Support Services)
**Solicitation Date:** February 6, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 27, 2023

## Description of Work
The Department of National Defence requires two senior instructional design and development services consultants for an initial period of one year with three optional one-year periods, if required. The requirement aims to provide instructional design and development services, including concept development, course design, and delivery for the National Capital Region.

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

* No Notice URL is provided as the procurement is not publicly announced through email. Interested suppliers can contact the Contracting Authority below for the RFP documents.
* The solicitation is open only to Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following stream:

`Stream 2: Instructional Design and Development Services`

## Invitation to Bid
Invitations have been sent to qualified Learning Services SA Holders, including:

Algonquin College of Applied Arts and Technology \
Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc. \
Calian Ltd. \
Deloitte Inc. \
Ernst & Young LLP

## Documents
The RFP documents will be provided via email by the Contracting Authority to the invited suppliers. Bidders are advised that Buy and Sell Website (a Quebec Government Website) is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

## Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for the requirement are specified in the request for proposal (RFP).

## Trade Agreements
The requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and progressive Agreement for TransPacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-United-Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)

## Contact
For inquiries or to obtain the RFP documents, contact:

* **Mel-nichuk, Viktoria**
* **Email:** <viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca
